content.description: Start on the corner arete at the base of the ledge and use small edges and slopers to the top.
content.location: At the base of the ledge, closest to the river on the arete.

content.description: Close to the very beginning of the ledge uphill from the river. Starts on a good edge and works directly up from there.
content.location: Near the top of the ledge furthest away from the river and closer to the trail.

content.description: Start low on small edges with very low feet and compress the corner until you reach the big ledge above the arete. From the slopey ledge, grab a precarious-looking flake and move your feet into a position so that you can reach the next decent flake before the top. Grab the top and move your feet up to the left, then reach further back for a good top out hold. A great compression problem that is oddly difficult.
content.location: This problem is very close to the river on the ledge and has a large piece of rock that juts out from the top to make a small overhang. It also starts below one of the tallest points on the ledge.

content.description: Start on a good edge with good feet and work up to top out.
content.location: To the left of Poison Dart on the short face before the base of the ledge. The only problem on this face.

content.description: Start at the base of the ledge closest to the river. Climb straight up the middle of the face to the top on small edges and good holds.
content.location: The closest problem to the river at the very base of the ledge. To the left of the Toad around the corner. The start serves as the start for Frog's Legs too.

content.description: Start at the base of the ledge on the face closest to the river on good holds. Work to the right and around the arete to top out on The Toad.
content.location: At the very base of the ledge, tops out on The Toad.

content.description: A long ledge close to the river directly down from the Trailside boulder. There is a lot of variety and some very interesting routes. At highest it is about 15 feet tall.
